info.name: Hollow
info.description: Corrupted spirits consumed by hunger, transformed into monstrous beings of instinct and power.
info.author: Cynful Aurora Project

description.p: Hollows are souls that failed to pass on peacefully and were consumed by their own despair, transforming into predatory spiritual creatures. Despite their monstrous nature, some regain fragments of sentience and harness their powers for purpose beyond instinct.

Born from pain and hunger, Hollows feed on spiritual energy to sustain themselves. Their forms vary widely, from animalistic beasts to humanoid revenants, all marked by a mask hiding their lost identity.

Ability Score Increase.Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Age.Hollows do not age naturally, persisting indefinitely unless purified or destroyed.
Alignment.Many Hollows lean toward chaotic alignments, but those with restored minds may follow any path.
Size.Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common and Hollow Speech.

Devourer’s Essence.When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you may consume its spiritual residue to regain hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 1). You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.
Cero Blast.You can unleash a condensed burst of spiritual energy. As an action, you fire a beam of energy at a creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier) or take 1d10 force damage. The damage increases by 1d10 at 5th, 11th, and 17th level. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.
Mask of the Lost.Your Hollow mask shields your essence. You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened and resistance to necrotic damage.
Monstrous Form.Your Hollow body grants natural weapons. You can make unarmed strikes that deal 1d6 slashing, piercing, or bludgeoning damage (choose when you attack).
